mapper.sql: trans_date, prod_luno, raw_all_num, raw_all_weight, raw_num, raw_weight, half_all_num, half_all_weight, half_num, half_weight, prod_all_num, prod_all_weight, prod_num, prod_weight, sale_raw_num, sale_raw_weight, sale_half_num, sale_half_weight, sale_prod_num, sale_prod_weight
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from bsl_lu_stock_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bsl_lu_stock_info (trans_date, prod_luno, raw_all_num, raw_all_weight, raw_num, raw_weight, half_all_num, half_all_weight, half_num, half_weight, prod_all_num, prod_all_weight, prod_num, prod_weight, sale_raw_num, sale_raw_weight, sale_half_num, sale_half_weight, sale_prod_num, sale_prod_weight) values (#{transDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rawAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rawAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{rawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{halfAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{halfAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{halfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{halfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{saleRawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleRawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{saleHalfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleHalfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{saleProdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleProdWeight,jdbcType=REAL})

mapper.update:
update bsl_lu_stock_info
trans_date = #{record.transDate,jdbcType=DATE},
prod_luno = #{record.prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
raw_all_num = #{record.rawAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
raw_all_weight = #{record.rawAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
raw_num = #{record.rawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
raw_weight = #{record.rawWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
half_all_num = #{record.halfAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
half_all_weight = #{record.halfAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},

half_weight = #{record.halfWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_all_num = #{record.prodAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prod_all_weight = #{record.prodAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},

update bsl_lu_stock_info set trans_date = #{record.transDate,jdbcType=DATE}, prod_luno = #{record.prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, raw_all_num = #{record.rawAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, raw_all_weight = #{record.rawAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, raw_num = #{record.rawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, raw_weight = #{record.rawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, half_all_num = #{record.halfAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, half_all_weight = #{record.halfAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, half_num = #{record.halfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, half_weight = #{record.halfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_all_num = #{record.prodAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_all_weight = #{record.prodAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_num = #{record.prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_weight = #{record.prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_raw_num = #{record.saleRawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_raw_weight = #{record.saleRawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_half_num = #{record.saleHalfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_half_weight = #{record.saleHalfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_prod_num = #{record.saleProdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_prod_weight = #{record.saleProdWeight,jdbcType=REAL}

update bsl_lu_stock_info
raw_all_num = #{rawAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
raw_all_weight = #{rawAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
raw_num = #{rawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
raw_weight = #{rawWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
half_all_num = #{halfAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
half_all_weight = #{halfAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
half_num = #{halfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
half_weight = #{halfWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_all_num = #{prodAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prod_all_weight = #{prodAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
prod_num = #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
prod_weight = #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
sale_raw_num = #{saleRawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_raw_weight = #{saleRawWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
sale_half_num = #{saleHalfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_half_weight = #{saleHalfWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
sale_prod_num = #{saleProdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_prod_weight = #{saleProdWeight,jdbcType=REAL},
where trans_date = #{transDate,jdbcType=DATE} and prod_luno = #{prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bsl_lu_stock_info set raw_all_num = #{rawAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, raw_all_weight = #{rawAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, raw_num = #{rawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, raw_weight = #{rawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, half_all_num = #{halfAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, half_all_weight = #{halfAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, half_num = #{halfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, half_weight = #{halfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_all_num = #{prodAllNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_all_weight = #{prodAllWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, prod_num = #{prodNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prod_weight = #{prodWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_raw_num = #{saleRawNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_raw_weight = #{saleRawWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_half_num = #{saleHalfNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_half_weight = #{saleHalfWeight,jdbcType=REAL}, sale_prod_num = #{saleProdNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_prod_weight = #{saleProdWeight,jdbcType=REAL} where trans_date = #{transDate,jdbcType=DATE} and prod_luno = #{prodLuno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') trans_date, a.prod_luno, if(isnull(a.raw_all_num),0,a.raw_all_num) as raw_all_num, if(isnull(a.raw_all_weight),0,a.raw_all_weight) as raw_all_weight, if(isnull(b.raw_num),0,b.raw_num) as raw_num, if(isnull(b.raw_weight),0,b.raw_weight) as raw_weight, if(isnull(c.sale_raw_num),0,c.sale_raw_num) as sale_raw_num, if(isnull(c.sale_raw_weight),0,c.sale_raw_weight) as sale_raw_weight, if(isnull(d.half_all_num),0,d.half_all_num) as half_all_num, if(isnull(d.half_all_weight),0,d.half_all_weight) as half_all_weight, if(isnull(e.half_num),0,e.half_num) as half_num, if(isnull(e.half_weight),0,e.half_weight) as half_weight, if(isnull(f.sale_half_num),0,f.sale_half_num) as sale_half_num, if(isnull(f.sale_half_weight),0,f.sale_half_weight) as sale_half_weight, if(isnull(g.prod_all_num),0,g.prod_all_num) as prod_all_num, if(isnull(g.prod_all_weight),0,g.prod_all_weight) as prod_all_weight, if(isnull(h.prod_num),0,h.prod_num) as prod_num, if(isnull(h.prod_weight),0,h.prod_weight) as prod_weight, if(isnull(i.sale_prod_num),0,i.sale_prod_num) as sale_prod_num, if(isnull(i.sale_prod_weight),0,i.sale_prod_weight) as sale_prod_weight from (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) raw_all_weight,count(*) raw_all_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '0' and prod_status != '0' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) a left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) raw_weight,count(*) raw_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '0' and prod_status = '1' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) b on a.prod_luno = b.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) sale_raw_weight,count(*) sale_raw_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '0' and prod_status = '4' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) c on a.prod_luno = c.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) half_all_weight,count(*) half_all_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '1' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) d on a.prod_luno = d.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) half_weight,count(*) half_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '1' and prod_status = '1' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) e on a.prod_luno = e.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) sale_half_weight,count(*) sale_half_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '1' and prod_status = '4' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) f on a.prod_luno = f.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) prod_all_weight,count(*) prod_all_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '2' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) g on a.prod_luno = g.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) prod_weight,count(*) prod_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '2' and prod_status = '1' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) h on a.prod_luno = h.prod_luno left join (select prod_luno,sum(prod_print_weight) sale_prod_weight,count(*) sale_prod_num from bsl_product_info where prod_type = '1' and prod_status = '4' and (prod_source is null or prod_source != '2') group by prod_luno) i on a.prod_luno = i.prod_luno
